definition: to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: This makes HIV testing to "regularize" a major step forward.
sentences.chinese: 這使艾滋病病毒檢測向“常規化”邁進了一大步。

sentences.english: As the foremost leader of school, a principal takes the lead of the entire faculty as well as students to stride into the world.
sentences.chinese: 校長爲學校的總頓導者，引頓著全校師生向國際邁進。

sentences.english: The world is marching toward brightness and progress.
sentences.chinese: 世界正向着光明和進步的目標邁進。

sentences.english: Embracing our past successes can literally skyrocket us toward what we want in life.
sentences.chinese: 肯定自己過去的成功能直接激勵我們向夢想邁進。

sentences.english: The album represented a leap forward for the maturing singer.
sentences.chinese: 該專輯意味着這位日臻成熟的歌手向前邁進了一大步。

sentences.english: We hope both sides continue to press ahead in this direction.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望各方繼續作出努力朝着這一方向邁進。

sentences.english: A new Pentagon report says China is already headed in that direction.
sentences.chinese: 五角大樓的一份新報告說中國已經朝這個方向邁進。

sentences.english: China textile city is also to the national textile innovation centre.
sentences.chinese: 中國輕紡城還在向全國紡織創意中心邁進。

sentences.english: This year we've made a big stride forward on the road of four modernizations.
sentences.chinese: 今年我們在四化道路上大大地邁進了一步。

sentences.english: It's not easy to get all parties headed in the right direction.
sentences.chinese: 促使所有各方都向正確的方向邁進絕非易事。

sentences.english: Internally and externally to the industry leading into the Jebsen.
sentences.chinese: 內外兼修，捷成向行業龍頭邁進。

sentences.english: I think we ought to fund the government and move on.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我們應該爲政府提供資金，然後向前邁進。

sentences.english: Two Magid consultants will serve them.
sentences.chinese: 兩位邁進媒體顧問將爲他們服務。

sentences.english: And now he's moving on to an exciting new professional opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，他要向一份令人興奮的新職邁進。

sentences.english: The company is also taking significant steps to capture the digital market.
sentences.chinese: “邦諾”公司還在向奪取電子市場邁進。

sentences.english: Fulcrum of violence where the hawk hangs still.
sentences.chinese: 那鷹的靜懸之處拼死邁進。

definition: to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
